Title: Constantine
Writer: Jamie Delano (comic book "Hellblazer"), Garth Ennis (comic book "Hellblazer"), Kevin Brodbin (story), Kevin Brodbin (screenplay), Frank A. Cappello (screenplay)
Actors: Keanu Reeves, Rachel Weisz, Shia LaBeouf, Djimon Hounsou
Plot: Supernatural exorcist and demonologist John Constantine helps a policewoman prove her sister's death was not a suicide, but something more.
Production: Warner Brothers, Di Bonaventura Pictures, Donners' Company
